content.rendered:
YourFavoriteGuy, also known as Guy Christensen, has used his platform as a social media influencer to openly support terrorist organizations like Hamas and Hezbollah by ignoring their existence and atrocities. By supporting the October 7 massacre, where Hamas and thousands of Palestinians brutally murdered, tortured, and kidnapped Israeli civilians, Christensen supports the actions of these groups. The massacre, which involved over 10,300 rockets fired into Israel and widespread attacks on civilian communities, left 1,139 people dead, including 695 Israeli civilians, and hundreds taken hostage into Gaza.

Guy’s refusal to acknowledge these atrocities, along with his vocal criticism of Israel, positions him as a sympathizer of terrorist organizations. Additionally, his support extends to Hezbollah, another recognized terrorist group that has been launching rockets, UAVs, and suicide drones from northern Israel since October 8, displacing over 100,000 Israelis and endangering millions of civilians. Hezbollah’s indiscriminate attacks on Israeli towns and cities further escalate violence and terror in the region, yet Guy continues to use his platform to spread anti-Israel narratives without addressing the reality of terrorism in the region.
